page.title: 04CASTLE AS TOURIST ATTRACTION
page.content: Of those visiting the castle, we found that about 47% knew about the castle for themselves, and that about 39% had found out from a relative or friend. The remaining 14% found out about it through other means eg from local guide books or by having seen the castle from a distance and then wishing to visit it one day. Everybody we interviewed who were visiting the castle said they were impressed with it. A large number of them found it very interesting and others thought it was a marvellous place. Quite a few thought it was picturesque. All of them said that they would recommend others to go there.
